医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究警告说，不含酒精的啤酒可能是细菌的欢乐时光研究人员发现，低酒精啤酒可以抑制细菌生长，而不含酒精的啤酒则更容易受到影响。储存温度和酒精含量是决定这些饮料中食源性病原体存在的主要因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Non-酒精-beers-may-be-a-happy-hour-for-bacteria-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Non-酒精-beers-may-be-a-happy-hour-for-bacteria-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1c53fe-d1ac-41ee-a72a-4c25647459ce Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:53:00 -0400 Non-alcoholic beers may be a happy hour for bacteria, study warns
适量饮酒可能会降低患某些癌症的风险《营养前沿》发表的一项荟萃​​分析发现，适量饮酒与癌症风险增加之间没有联系；相反，它表明葡萄酒可能对某些类型的肿瘤具有保护作用。需要进一步的研究来证实这些发现并了解所涉及的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Moderate-wine-conspiration-may-reduce-the-risk-of-some-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Moderate-wine-conspiration-may-reduce-the-risk-of-some-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1993f08e-53ee-4e82-984a-bf793e88b7d4 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:36:00 -0400 Moderate wine consumption may reduce the risk of some cancers
新候选药物被发现对治疗罕见的威胁视力的眼部感染非常有效一项新的国际临床试验发现，SIFI SpA 目前正在开发一种基于伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 和莫菲尔德眼科医院 (Moorfields Eye Hospital) 开创性研究的候选药物，该药物对于治疗罕见的威胁视力的眼部感染非常有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-drug-candidate-found-to-be-highly- effective-in-treating-rare-sight-throne-eye-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-drug-candidate-found-to-be-highly- effective-in-treating-rare-sight-throne-eye-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=733cf877-303f-402d-9ec5-9dc765bd19f5 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:32:06 -0400 New drug candidate found to be highly effective in treating rare sight-threatening eye infection
被诊断患有多动症的最小儿童与年长同龄人一样有可能保留诊断科学家发现，班上年龄最小的被诊断患有多动症的孩子与同年级年龄较大的学生一样有可能保留诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Youngest-children-diagnosed-with-ADHD-just-as-likely-to-keep-diagnosis-as-older-peers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Youngest-children-diagnosed-with-ADHD-just-as-likely-to-keep-diagnosis-as-older-peers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dfc8970-bed6-4db5-a7a4-d60c435d2028 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:27:15 -0400 Youngest children diagnosed with ADHD just as likely to keep diagnosis as older peers
基于微泡的生物标志物可以改善 NIR-PIT 癌症治疗日本名古屋大学的研究人员及其合作者使用基于微泡的生物标记物来评估近红外光免疫疗法（NIR-PIT）治疗的成功与否。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Microbubble-based-biomarker-could-improve-NIR-PIT-treatment-for-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Microbubble-based-biomarker-could-improve-NIR-PIT-treatment-for-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=161d1001-18c7-4f41-a8af-520fe7e62c86 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:13:54 -0400 Microbubble-based biomarker could improve NIR-PIT treatment for cancer
人工智能设计的候选药物显示出抑制胃酸的前景日本名古屋大学的研究人员创建并改进了人工智能（AI）设计，以合成比现有药物具有更好结合亲和力的新型胃酸抑制剂候选化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-Designed-drug-candidate-shows-promise-for-gastric-acid-inhibition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-Designed-drug-candidate-shows-promise-for-gastric-acid-inhibition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1df06cd-bd61-4dbe-a0a2-7ae21f20483b Thu, 26 Oct 2023 23:00:48 -0400 AI-designed drug candidate shows promise for gastric acid inhibition
研究表明噬菌体可以促进哺乳动物细胞的生长和存活噬菌体，也称为噬菌体，是感染并杀死细菌（细菌的天然宿主）的病毒。但从大分子的角度来看，噬菌体可以被视为包裹在氨基酸外壳中的营养丰富的核苷酸包。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Study-shows-phages-can-promote-mammalian-cellular-growth-and-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Study-shows-phages-can-promote-mammalian-cellular-growth-and-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b96a3e-c7dc-4aa8-b1b6-53fecfcf0521 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:27:38 -0400 Study shows phages can promote mammalian cellular growth and survival
饮用水中的氟化物暴露与儿童认知缺陷有关杜兰大学的一项新的试点研究表明，长期饮用氟化物含量远高于既定饮用水标准的水可能与儿童认知障碍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fluoride-exposure-in-drinking-water-linked-to-cognitive-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fluoride-exposure-in-drinking-water-linked-to-cognitive-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e40cc5f8-5657-44e4-8950-af72357ed2aa Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:19:07 -0400 Fluoride exposure in drinking water linked to cognitive deficits in children
基于逆转录元件的基因编辑是否比 CRISPR-Cas 方法更安全？在《Perspective》中，Stephen Tang 和 Samuel Sternberg 讨论了基于逆转录元件的基因编辑作为 CRISPR-Cas 方法的更安全替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Is-retroelement-based-gene-editing-a-safer-alternative-to-CRISPR-Cas-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Is-retroelement-based-gene-editing-a-safer-alternative-to-CRISPR-Cas-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5acc99e1-545a-4294-bf41-c10d054cbc30 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:14:40 -0400 Is retroelement-based gene editing a safer alternative to CRISPR-Cas approaches?
疟疾蛋白的发现为对抗致命感染开辟了新途径疟疾蛋白的发现可以帮助寄生虫在红细胞内生长，并在寄生虫的免疫逃避策略中发挥关键的调节作用，这可能为对抗这种致命感染的新疫苗或疗法铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Malaria- Protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-combating-deadly-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Malaria- Protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-combating-deadly-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa30a6c1-7dd4-4737-b05c-d390fadf57da Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:03:37 -0400 Malaria protein discovery opens new avenues for combating deadly infection
